+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #105775 +++

I am experiencing the same problem. In a web project's Java perspective, I select a package in which I want to create a servlet. I click File --> New --> Other... then Web --> Servlet. Nothing happens. Here's my config and the error from the log file:

Passing to core for comment.  My guess is that the servlet wizard is attempting to create a project with a path separator in it.

Bug is in the caller, they must supply a valid project name:

org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.operation.ArtifactEditOperationDataModel.getTargetProject

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 105775 ***

traces.message: Path for project must have only one segment.
Path for project must have only one segment.
